name: Sokoloop
description:
Overview

A game done in two weeks for the Arcadia Jam 3, with the theme "Loop" 🔁

I've done the game by myself, so there is no sound and the graphics are "meh", it lacks some graphical and musical feedbacks for the player to understand exactly what's going on, but I focused on game and level design.

There is currently not much levels, but each one present some interesting interactions between the game rules.

Instructions

Use arrow keys to move, S to Undo and Z to reset.

Credits

Palette used : Matriax8c by Davit Masia

Enjoy and don't hesite to leave feedback 👍

Oh, and there is no secret in the game.
